Data Fields

ZDO_Status_t status

Detailed Description

Describes the parameters of the ZDO_SleepConf() function.

Definition at line 292 of file zdo.h.

Field Documentation

ZDO_Status_t ZDO_SleepConf_t::status

Stack is ready to sleep if status is ZDO_SUCCESS_STATUS, stack is not ready to sleep if status is ZDO_BUSY_STATUS
